headline: Apollo CEO weighs in on US investments, trade tariffs
summary: From the Milken Institute's 2025 Global Conference, Apollo Global Management (APO) Co-Founder and CEO Marc Rowan sits down with Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi for a conversation about the safety of US investments strained by tariff uncertainties, his thoughts on the United States' trade policies, and Apollo's own corporate portfolio. Note: Apollo Global Management is the parent company of Yahoo Finance. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here.
